rows.label: tlk45300451_02_msg0002
rows.name:
I knew on some level this might happen
from the day I first decided to leave
him behind and make a life of my own...

rows.label: tlk45300451_02_msg0003
rows.name:
But it still hurts that I
didn't get to see my old
man again before he died.

rows.label: tlk45300451_02_msg0004
rows.name:
You were there for his last
moments, weren't you?

rows.label: tlk45300451_02_msg0005
rows.name: I hope he was happy, at least...

rows.label: tlk45300451_02_msg0006
rows.name:
My dad's real home was here, in Alba
Cavanich. To tell the truth, I was hoping
I could bring him back here someday.
